setExclusiveToSite: sets a Variable as isExclusiveToSite (used when a Site fails and recovers)
setFreeToRead(boolean) - Method in class Variable
setFreeToRead: sets a Variable as available for reading (used when a Site fails and recovers)
setIntermediateValue(int) - Method in class Variable
setIntermediateValue: sets the value that will potentially be written to a Variable before a Transaction commits
setIntermediateValueSetBy(String) - Method in class Variable
setIntermediateValueSetBy: sets the Transaction ID of the Transaction that sets the intermediateValue of the Variable
setLock(boolean) - Method in class Variable
setLock: sets the Variable's state to locked if a Transaction acquires a lock on the Variable

setLocksHeldByTransaction: sets the list of LockObj(s) held by this Transaction

setTransactionID: sets the ID of the Transaction associated with this lock
setTransactionsWhichCurrentTransactionWaitsFor(Set<String>) - Method in class Transaction
setTransactionsWhichCurrentTransactionWaitsFor: adds IDs to the set of Transaction IDs which the current Transaction is waiting

setTransactionWaitingForCurrentTransaction: sets the Transaction waiting for the current Transaction in question
